name: Hotel Angedras

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A new hotel in a nice, quiet residential area. Clean, comfortable large room with balcony. We were on the wing that looks out onto the surrounding houses, not the main wing that overlooks the hotel courtyard - which is much less private, and I think would cause a different experience and review. Underground parking. 20-minute walk into the old town, but a nice bar half-way, just as you reach the ocean edge. Some shops nearby the hotel.
reviews.title: Good hotel; poor restaurant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Their restaurant in the town is heavily advertised in the hotel, but like others we had a very bad experience there: the place was full but they found us a table - but we waited an hour and then they brought our second course (i.e. no first course!) and it was cold. We sent it back and walked out. Others at nearby tables said they had waited 45 minutes between courses. It seems they just can't manage service at the restaurant.
reviews.title: My home from home in Alghero....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011
reviews.text: I have lost count how many times I have stayed at the Hotel Angedras, but it is between 5-10 times both with family and on my own. Everything about the hotel is superb and each year they have improved and added new features to the rooms. This year was fridges and a improved TV system in the rooms.
reviews.title: Ok but nothing special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is always superbly clean in both the communal areas and the rooms. Breakfast is very nice and the terrace is a wonderful wake up call.
reviews.title: Good hotel – bad sleep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For me, what makes the hotel the best is the staff. They are always caring to me and my family and nothing is too much trouble for them and we would not stay anywhere else in Alghero.
reviews.title: not ready for prime time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just to make that clear: Hotel Angedras is a very good hotel, and we had a very nice stay there. They are so close to five dots in stead of four. But perfectionism are in the details, so...:
reviews.title: Close to perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Their slogan is "passion for hospitality". Well, imagine you were invited to a friend for a glass of wine. You come, hours go by, but no wine. Then you feel you must ask: "How about that wine?" Immediate response: "Yes, of course! When do you want it?" Would you say that friend has a passion for hospitality? Well, that was exactly what we experienced at hotel Angedras. A complimentary bottle of wine was a part of our room deal, but no wine anywhere. But when we asked for it: Yes, of course, when do you want it? It would have been nice if it was in our room on arrival!
reviews.title: Simple, clean room but beware as it can be noisy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Time for breakfast: Nice buffet, but no coffee. Calling for the waiter. Could we have a cup of coffee? Yes, of course! (And what a coffee it was!) Could we have a second cup? Yes, of course! All in all, nothing is a problem at hotel Angedras, as long as you ask for it! But the "would you like some coffee" attitude is definitely nicer!
reviews.title: Outstanding service in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A detail of a different kind: There were plenty of toiletries in the bathroom. Small shampoo bottles, pieces of soap. But in the shower: No place to put it! Not a tiny shelf. Result: Acrobatic exercises with a small bottle in your right hand while shampooing with your left before getting hold of the soap from the floor while getting rid of the shampoo bottle. A small shelf would make a challenge a nice experience in an otherwise perfect bathroom.
reviews.title: ease and service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So, to conclude: Angedras is a very nice hotel that I wouldn't hesitate to return to, and close to perfect if they change the attitude from "We give you all you ask for" to "What can we do for you?"
reviews.title: Fabulous Find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I was in this hotel two years ago and since then it has improved in all aspects. Now it has free Internet acces using a portable PC in the lobby, and you can also use wifi access. Also the parking is free and the staff is really friendly and hard working. Should I come back to Alghero I would stay again.
reviews.title: Still an excellent choice for staying at Alghero

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean, nice and friendly. Continental breakfast but if you want bread; look for the parma ham/cheese toasts=) Free parking. Only about 10 minutes walk from old town of Alghero. Would definitely come here again.
reviews.title: Small cozy hotel with a big balcony, great service and lovely breakfast area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is conviently located 20 mins from Algeros centre in a small side road. We stayed here since we were looking for a place to stay the last night on the island planning to visit old Aghero as well as getting to the airport with the car the next day smoothly. Although we were a bit unsure about the hotel prior to our arrival we were totally convinced by the helpful and friendly staff who provided us with all the information we needed. The room was spotless, the bath modern and perfectly clean. The small balcony opened to the garden of a neighbour. When we were asking for an early breakfast the next morning, we were surprised by the variety of the food and the large terrace where you can sip your morning cappuccino while enjoying the rising sun. We would give five stars if the balconys would feature two chairs and a bit of decoration. Never the less, great value for money!
reviews.title: Great staff, great service, great breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hotel Angedras for 3 nights in June. The location is only a 15 minutes walk to the main strip in Alghero, which isn't bad at all. The staff was very accommodating and helpful. The rooms were good size and I loved the little patio area, which we would sit out on at night before dinner, enjoying a glass of wine. Also free wi-fi was great!
reviews.title: Loved our stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was good, with lots of options. The beach shuttle is also helpful, however it only runs at 10:30AM and 5:00 p.m. so be prepared for a full day at the beach. The beach it takes you too is beautiful, with the option to rent chairs and umbrellas.
reviews.title: Would DEFINITELY recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel based on TA reviews and were not disappointed. Nice people, clean rooms and ok location. Would definitely stay here again. If you look for a quick meal or a drink nearby I would recommend the bar "la Bavarese" in Via Manzoni 69. We went there for a late lunch on arrival and were warmly welcomed by the charming hostess. Her son and husband make the most delicious cakes and pastries.
reviews.title: Recommend this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Recommended!
reviews.title: LOVELY VERY CLEAN HOTEL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel before.It is in a quiet residential area and about a 20min walk into the centre of Alghero.The Hotel is very clean and attractive with very attentive staff.
reviews.title: Attention

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: We stayed on the third(top) floor overlooking the breakfast terrace and the room was spacious with a large double bed.Breakfast is continental style with fruit,ham and cheese,croissants,cake,bread rolls etc.
reviews.title: Excellent choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a shuttle bus provided by the hotel to the beaches which are situated on the north side and where most of the other hotels are situated.At the time of writing there is ongoing construction work which could impact on some of the hotels on the front.
reviews.title: Worst Hotel Ever!!!

description: 3 star hotel in Alghero (Sardinia) open all year around within walking distance of the historical centre. Shuttle to the beach, restaurant, parking and internet Wi-Fi free.
